overview: Doom Valley’s Wasteland is filled with a motley collection of characters, each maintaining a stronghold over their respective territories. A team of mercenaries find themselves in a race against time as they attempt to keep a pair of volatile sex-crazed Synthetics safe from a ruthless Warlord and her bounty hunters, who chase the mercs’ RV across the desert landscape in this action-packed, sex-fueled thrill ride!
title: Wasteland Ultra
